extractClientIp

public static java.lang.String extractClientIp(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
Extract the client IP passed on the request. An IP passed in the X_FORWARDED_FOR header, otherwise falls back to the ip defined on the request.

Parameters:
request - to extract IP from.
Returns:
the client IP address.

extractCookiesFromRequest

public static java.lang.Iterable<KeyValuePair> extractCookiesFromRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
Extracts the cookies defined on an HttpServletRequest as a list of KeyValuePairs.

Parameters:
request - to read cookies from.
Returns:
iterable of KeyValuePairs. Empty if there were no cookies.

extractCookiesFromHeaders

public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> extractCookiesFromHeaders(java.lang.Iterable<KeyValuePair> headers)
Extracts all cookies defined in the headers. Each cookie is expected to be included as an individual "Set-Cookie" header, only the name and value are retained in the format "key=value".

Parameters:
headers - to search
Returns:
all cookies found as StringUtils, or empty if none found.

Parameters:
request - to extract URL from
Returns:
complete URL including query parameters.
